meanings.sent1: The clown wore bizarres clothes to the party.
meanings.sent2: The haunted house had a bizarres atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The bizarres hat made everyone laugh.

meanings.definition: A person, thing, or situation that is strange or unusual
meanings.sent1: The town was full of bizarres who told wild stories.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the neighborhood bizarres.
meanings.sent3: The bizarres of the group always made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The old house was a bizarres of mysteries.
meanings.sent5: The bizarres in the movie added excitement to the plot.
